name: "Free Citizen" Civic Initiatives Support Center
goal:
1. The Organization’s mission is to support the civic initiatives, to promote the formation of civic society, improvement of legal awareness of the society and formation of legal culture in the society.

2. The following are the aims of the Organization stipulated by the law:

2.1. Human rights protection, improvement of legal awareness related to the citizens’ rights and other related problems;
2.2. Human rights protection and multilateral assistance to civil initiatives directed to nature protection;
2.3. assistance to the European integration of the Republic of Armenia, implementation of liabilities of our country within the framework of the Council of Europe and “Eastern Partnership” program, as well as propagation and introduction of humanistic common to all mankind values in Armenia;
2.4. struggle against corruption, detection of corruption in the state and local self-governance bodies, making them public and consistent struggle directed to the punishment of officials involved in them;
2.5. to assist in the regulation of oppositions in the South-Caucasian region, to peace and establishment of friendship among nations;
2.6. assistance to the accountability of the public administration bodies before the citizens, improvement of civil control over them;
2.7. support for the improvement of the role of NGOs.
2.8. assistance to democracy development in the Republic of Armenia, improvement of legislation, the institutional establishment of legal state, practical application of international norms and domestic legislation;
2.9. promotion of the participation of society in all the spheres of public administration;
2.10. development of programs directed to economic reforms or assistance to their development, realization and control;
2.11. cooperation with international organizations, youth and public organizations.
interests: Culture, Education and training, European Neighbourhood Policy, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Sport, Youth
